abstracts.cdata!:
The project will help finance: (a) a
            program of training to build up local skills in economic and
            financial management, accounting, procurement, project
            analysis and statistics; (b) technical assistance, studies
            and logistical support to improve economic management and
            facilitate the transition including a pilot program for the
            privatization and liquidation of parastatals; and (c)
            supervision and project management to closely monitor
            project implementation. The project consists of the
            following components: (a) human resource development; (b)
            economic statistics; (c) legal assistance; (d) public
            resource management; and (e) liberalization policies.
